an9.23:1.1: “Nava, bhikkhave, tanhamulake dhamme desessami, tam sunatha.
an9.23:1.2: Katame ca, bhikkhave, nava tanhamulaka dhamma?
an9.23:1.3: Tanham paticca pariyesana, pariyesanam paticca labho, labham paticca vinicchayo, vinicchayam paticca chandarago, chandaragam paticca ajjhosanam, ajjhosanam paticca pariggaho, pariggaham paticca macchariyam, macchariyam paticca arakkho, arakkhadhikaranam dandadanam satthadanam kalahaviggahavivadatuvamtuvampesunnamusavada aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti.
an9.23:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, nava tanhamulaka dhamma”ti.
